pullRequest.title: DROOLS-5723 dmn engine signavio concat function
pullRequest.bodyText:
Thank you for submitting this pull request
JIRA:
link


How to retest this PR or trigger a specific build:



a pull request please add comment: Jenkins retest this


a full downstream build please add comment: Jenkins run fdb


a compile downstream build please  add comment: Jenkins run cdb


a full production downstream build please add comment: Jenkins execute product fdb


an upstream build please add comment: Jenkins run upstream

commit.message:
Merge pull request #1 from kiegroup/master

Update master from kiegroup repo
DROOLS-5723 Implement Signavio DMN concat() function

nodes.bodyText: We didn't include the copyright/license notice that is present in the other classes here, because we weren't sure if we could simply copy it. Please add it if it's needed!

commit.message: DROOLS-5723 Add test case for empty list

yeah, in general it would suffice to copy it from other classes and update the year :)
I've added a code suggestion so it should be easy as to click the GitHub action in order to have this integrated on this PR before the merge
